cardData.name: Minnow Mercs
cardData.abilityText: +1 Power for each adjacent friendly Fish.

cardData.name: Sardine Scout
cardData.abilityText: Can pass through spaces occupied by enemies.

cardData.name: Puny Puffer
cardData.abilityText: +1 Power while Damaged.

cardData.name: Blengineer
cardData.abilityText: +1 Hammer while adjacent to an island you control.

cardData.name: Goldfish Gladiator
cardData.abilityText: +2 Pearls after defeating an enemy.

cardData.name: Sword Shrimp
cardData.abilityText: Becomes a Two-Sword Shrimp after defeating an enemy.

cardData.name: Krill Crew
cardData.abilityText: +1 Order while adjacent to an island you control.

cardData.name: Reclusive Hermit
cardData.abilityText: +2 Power when no friendly units are adjacent to it.

cardData.name: Fiddler Bard
cardData.abilityText: +2 Pearls at Upkeep while adjacent to an island you control.

cardData.name: Curious Craw
cardData.abilityText: +1 Vision.

cardData.name: Pearl Peddler
cardData.abilityText: +2 Pearls at Upkeep.

cardData.name: Ink Escapist
cardData.abilityText: Gains a free Move order after taking damage in battle.

cardData.name: Signal Squid
cardData.abilityText: Grants adjacent friendly units +1 Power.

cardData.name: Razor Clam Raider
cardData.abilityText: Steals an extra 2 Pearls when Robbing an enemy.

cardData.name: Moon Wrasse
cardData.abilityText: -1 Power and Movement while you are at the top of the Sundial.

cardData.name: Triggerfish Tracker
cardData.abilityText: Can see Hidden units. +1 Vision.

cardData.name: Cleaner Crew
cardData.abilityText: Friendly Fish heal 1 Damage if they start Army Phase adjacent to Cleaner Crew.

cardData.name: Construction Grouper
cardData.abilityText: +1 Hammer.

cardData.name: Squizard
cardData.abilityText: Can spend 1 Order to teleport to a tile adjacent to an Island you control.

cardData.name: Cuttle-Creep
cardData.abilityText: Hidden.

cardData.name: Inkscreener
cardData.abilityText: Friendly units adjacent to this are Hidden.

cardData.name: Urchin Underling
cardData.abilityText: Deals 1 Damage to any unit that starts battle with it.

cardData.name: Launch Frog
cardData.abilityText: +2 Movement if Launch Frog starts Army Phase adjancet to an Island.

cardData.name: Tadpole
cardData.abilityText: At the end of the next Build Phase, transforms into a random Rare or Unique Amphibian.

cardData.name: Sand Dollar Broker
cardData.abilityText: +1 Pearl at Upkeep for every other Echinoderm in your Army.

cardData.name: Sergeant Starfish
cardData.abilityText: Seargant Starfish ignores the effects of enemy abilities in battle.

cardData.name: Longbow Archerfish
cardData.abilityText: Can battle enemies an extra tile away.

cardData.name: Musketeel
cardData.abilityText: If you have 2 Musketeel, add the Third Musketeel to your hand.

cardData.name: Swordfish Samurai
cardData.abilityText: If Swordfish Samurai loses a battle and survives, it destroys itself.

cardData.name: Auctioneel
cardData.abilityText: Whenever a tie occurs at the Auction, you decide who buys the card.

cardData.name: Great White
cardData.abilityText: The first enemy to defeats this adds the Great White Tooth to their hand.

cardData.name: Stonefish
cardData.abilityText: Whenever a unit takes damage from Stonefish, it is destroyed.

cardData.name: Spider-Crab Supreme
cardData.abilityText: +1 Power to adjacent Crustaceans.

cardData.name: Mastermind Muusoctopus
cardData.abilityText: If you have 4 or more Mollusks, +2 Orders and +2 Hammers.

cardData.name: Ancient Axolotl
cardData.abilityText: Friendly Amphibians heal 1 Damage during Upkeep.

cardData.name: Reef Turtle
cardData.abilityText: If you are controlling The Reef during Upkeep, +2 VP.
